channel.title: Go on Joe Kratzat
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Joe Kratzat

item.title: Go Hugo
item.description:
I’ve been working a lot with Go lately, and clearly I don’t blog at all. My last post was 2014. So I decided to upgrade my blog to use Hugo in hopes to get my involved once more.

Mainly this is a test to make sure my deployment works well. Because let’s be honest, if deployment becomes a pain I won’t do it.
